content.text:
I did a thing! It's Patchbay but *[solarized](http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized)*. I've also learned that while writing MCSS may be a great way to keep your code organized, trying to hack on an already-existing design to make small changes seems *much* more difficult than necessary. Maybe I'm doing it wrong?

![screenshot of solarized patchbay mcss color scheme](&fHrMSS9Dnt92TqsqgjDRj7HUKDiCzSKoc5doMYWQUFA=.sha256)

![another screenshot of my solarized patchbay mcss color scheme](&Lu7Z/FT5QK3MHyNZowcnGna83uuCHxWhT4A92ppikl4=.sha256)

As you can see, I've still got a lot of work to do.
